question: Welcome to FitBot! What's your primary fitness goal?

options.label: Cardio
options.advice: Focus on 30-45 min cardio + calorie deficit. Include protein-rich meals.

options.label: Strength + Cardio
options.advice: Mix strength 3x/week with HIIT. Reduce refined carbs.

goal_weight_gain.question: Do you want clean bulk or fast gain?

options.label: Clean bulk
options.advice: Calorie surplus of 300-500 kcal, protein 1.6-2g/kg, strength training.

options.label: Fast gain
options.advice: Higher calorie surplus, nutrient-dense meals and progressive overload.

options.label: Intermediate/Advanced
options.advice: Split routines, progressive overload, adequate recovery.

goal_maintain.advice: Maintain calorie balance, mix cardio and strength, track weekly weight and adjust.
